item.title: Trump Administration Orders Work Halted on Wind Farm That Is Nearly Built
item.description: The order to stop construction on Revolution Wind off the coast of Rhode Island is part of a campaign against renewable energy.

item.title: Nvidia Is Making a New Chip for China Amid Debate on AI Exports
item.description: Jensen Huang, Nvidia’s chief executive, said he plans to ask the Trump administration’s permission to sell a more powerful chip to Chinese companies.
